indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease
target_name: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals metadata for target 3.4
graph_title: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease
source_other_info_1: Data requested from NOMIS 'Query data' on the 'Life events - Mortality statistics - underlying cause, sex and age (2013 to 2018)' database.
other_info: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator. This indicator has not been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
